SEARCH
Module com.example.turinggame
Package Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable
public class Game extends Object implements Observable
The Game class represents the main logic and state of the game. It manages the game's progression, including starting a game, entering codes, choosing validators, and managing rounds. It also implements the Observable interface to update observers with changes in game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructor for Game. Initializes the command manager and sets the game's initial state.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int problemIndex)
      Starts a new game with the given problem index. Initializes the problem and notifies observers of the change. Randomly selects a problem index if the provided index is 0.
      Parameters:
      problemIndex - The index of the problem to start. Randomly selected if set to 0.
      Throws:
      TuringException - If the provided index is invalid.

    • enterCode

      public void enterCode(int code)
      Enters a code into the current round of the problem. Executes the EnterCodeCmd command and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      code - The code to be entered.

    • chooseValidator

      public void chooseValidator(int validatorIndex)
      Chooses a validator based on the given index. Executes the ChooseValidatorCmd command and notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      validatorIndex - The index of the validator to be chosen.

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      Advances to the next round in the problem. Executes the NextRoundCmd command and notifies observers.

    • guessCode

      public void guessCode(int code)
      Makes a guess of the secret code. Ends the game and updates the state accordingly, then notifies observers.
      Parameters:
      code - The guessed code.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the last command. Calls undo on the command manager and notifies observers.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redoes the last undone command. Calls redo on the command manager and notifies observers.

    • giveUp

      public void giveUp()
      Gives up on the current game. Sets the game state to over and not discovered, then notifies observers.

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers()
      Notifies all observers about a change in the game state. Constructs a new GameState object and updates each observer.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface Observable

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Observer observer)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers.
      Specified by:
      addObserver in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be added.

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(Observer observer)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers.
      Specified by:
      removeObserver in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be removed.
